PROFILE.NO_TEXT: You don't have assigned tests yet. But you can pass one yourself

WRITING_INPUT.TEXTAREA_LABEL: The field is not available until you select the topic

SELECT_LEVEL.TITLE: About Test
SELECT_LEVEL.TEXT: You have 60 minutes to complete all blocks. Good luck!

GRAMMAR.TITLE: Grammar Test
GRAMMAR.TEXT: You need to answer 15 questions. Each question can have from 3 to 5 answers. Good luck!

LISTENING.TITLE: Listening
LISTENING.TEXT: In order to start listening you need to click the Start button. This audio will be available for listening 3 times. After listening, 10 questions will be available for you to answer. Good Luck!

WRITING.TITLE: Writing
WRITING.TEXT: You need to choose a topic for your essay. After selecting a topic, the writing space will become active. The maximum number of characters is 512.  Good luck!

SPEAKING.TITLE: Speaking
SPEAKING.TEXT: You need to select the topic of the speaking, once you select the topic, a button to start recording will be available to you. When you have finished talking, click the stop button. (Remember you have 5 minutes. Good Luck!

RESULTS.TITLE: Result
RESULTS.EMPTY: Choose your test date to observe
